## @firebase/messaging/sw

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getMessaging(app)](./messaging_sw.getmessaging.md) | Retrieves a Firebase Cloud Messaging instance. |
|  [isSupported()](./messaging_sw.issupported.md) | Checks whether all required APIs exist within SW Context |
|  [onBackgroundMessage(messaging, nextOrObserver)](./messaging_sw.onbackgroundmessage.md) | Called when a message is received while the app is in the background. An app is considered to be in the background if no active window is displayed. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [FcmOptions](./messaging_sw.fcmoptions.md) | Options for features provided by the FCM SDK for Web. See [WebpushFcmOptions](https://firebase.google.com/docs/reference/fcm/rest/v1/projects.messages#webpushfcmoptions) |
|  [MessagePayload](./messaging_sw.messagepayload.md) | Message payload that contains the notification payload that is represented with [NotificationPayload](./messaging_.notificationpayload.md) and the data payload that contains an arbitrary number of key-value pairs sent by developers through the [Send API](https://firebase.google.com/docs/reference/fcm/rest/v1/projects.messages#notification) |
|  [Messaging](./messaging_sw.messaging.md) | Public interface of the Firebase Cloud Messaging SDK. |
|  [NotificationPayload](./messaging_sw.notificationpayload.md) | Display notification details. They are sent through the [Send API](https://firebase.google.com/docs/reference/fcm/rest/v1/projects.messages#notification) |
